smell_analysis.justification: All diagrams in the provided document contain elements; no empty diagrams were found.

All use cases are associated with an actor. While 'Vaata kõiki ootel või mitteaktiivseid autosid' (Page 3) is connected via «include» relationships, this is valid as it is initiated by the actors of the including use cases.
No distinct use cases with synonymous names associated with the same actor were found.
No duplicate element names were found within the same package scope.
No unconnected redundant data columns were found. Repetitive columns like 'nimetus' or 'reg_aeg' refer to attributes of distinct entities (e.g., person vs. car) or are linked via foreign keys.
Use case naming is consistent. All use cases start with an active verb (e.g., 'Vaata', 'Tuvasta', 'Registreeri').
In the state diagram (Page 9), all states are reachable from the Start node or other states.
In the activity diagram (Page 4), the flow is continuous and all actions are reachable.

On the Class Diagram 'Autode register (Klassifikaator)' (Page 12), the association between the class 'Auto' and 'Auto_kütuse_liik' is missing a multiplicity indicator at the 'Auto' end (it shows '1' at the classifier end but no '0..*' or '1' at the Auto end).
No diagram exceeds the limit of 10 central elements. The largest database diagrams (e.g., Page 15) contain 9 tables.
No single class or table has 6 or more visual connection lines on a single diagram page. The maximum observed is 5 connections for the 'Isik' class on Page 6.
The diagram layouts are balanced with no elements placed at an excessive distance relative to the average.
All use cases and activity diagram actions start with active verbs (e.g., 'Vaata', 'Otsi', 'Vali').
No element names were found with 3 or fewer characters (shortest are 'Isik', 'Riik', 'Auto' which have 4 characters).
All class names start with an uppercase letter and are singular (e.g., 'Auto', 'Isik').
All attributes and columns start with a lowercase letter (e.g., 'e_meil', 'reg_aeg').
No disallowed type prefixes (like 'tbl_', 'str') were found. Prefixes present (PK_, FK_, IXFK_) are explicitly allowed.
